post.author: 최덕선
post.content:
Position: Application Software Developer. Location: Downtown Toronto Duration: Contract 12 months Start Date: December 1st
Description:
Our Client is looking for a person do to a Migration from .net 1.1 web application to .net 3.5.
You should have Recent Experience with :
Migrating application from Window 2000 platform to Window 2008 Upgrade application from using Oracle database 9i to 0g Using .Net framework 3.5 Converting existing code from .Net 1.1 to .Net 3.5 Upgrade web application to support IE 8
Basic Skills required :
Skills: [Programming Language] .Net 1.x/2.0/3.5, XML, Web Service, C# [Database] Oracle 8/9i/10g [O/S] Windows 2000/2008 [Tools] ClearCase, ClearQuest, Toad, MS Visual Studio 2003/2008
• Possesses solid analytical skills for complex problem solving • Is able to manage multiple priorities • Is able adapt and quickly develop in-depth technical understanding of new/different applications • Is detail oriented with strong organizational skills • Demonstrates solid communication skills, both written and verbal • Demonstrates good leadership skills and independence
Please email your Updated resume to Shannenb@procom.ca
post.title: Application Software Developer ( 1 year )
